change-your-life-change-your-environment.title: How to change your life: Start changing your environment
change-your-life-change-your-environment.description: Changing your life is not that hard. Knowing this one trick could help wonders.

employed-vs-self-employed-my-decision-af.title: On Graduation
employed-vs-self-employed-my-decision-af.description: 2015 is one of my productive and life changing year ever. I learned a ton, achieved a ton, and sadly—lost tons of time here. This is also the same year I graduated from college and entered adult life. At last, I can focus on what matters now.

definition-of-design-and-the-difference-.title: Definition of Design—and The Difference With Art
definition-of-design-and-the-difference-.description: Society interpret design as sketches, painting, packaging. Some of them take it as a product—camera, phone, sofa, and chairs. It's true, but design is not that limited. In fact, design is broad.
